FAQ

  1. What is Blexisma Wiktionary Support?
  2. Why is it useful?
What is Blexisma Wiktionary Support?

A tool that extracts lexical networks from wiktionary dump files.

[top]

Why is it useful?

The lexical network is used to train a set of conceptual vectors.

[top]
